      • commitBranchMergeToMaster

        public void commitBranchMergeToMaster(java.lang.String baseCommitMessage)
        This adds, commits changes to the branch. Then it pulls master and merges in the branch, pushes master. This will now retry the pull, merge and push on failure.
        Parameters:
        baseCommitMessage -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
